page.title: 01REVIEW
page.content: There is a clear contrast in this block between the traditional{rural} and the hi-technology,{industrial} landscapes. Most of the area is in Llanstadwell Community (population 1981 - 985), the rest is in Milford Haven. The{settlements}are all small offering only basic amenities and comprising several isolated farms, 3 hamlets, 2 villages and the outskirts of the small town of Neyland. The{farmland}undulates at about 50m and is used for dairying and early vegetables. There are 2 small{industrial {estates}overshadowed by the{Oil {Refinery}and its associated storage. At the{coast}the narrow shingle beach is backed by steep slopes except at Llanstadwell's mudflats. by Eileen Seal
